title: Yaar Aval Yaaro Lyrics MUK Songs Lyrics
stanzas:
Singers: Mohammed Irfan.
Song: Yaar Aval Yaaro

Lyrics: Thamarai
MOvie:  Muppozhudhum Un Karpanaigal
Music: GV Prakash Kumar

Yaar, 
aval yaaro, aval yaaro, kanaa thaano
Yaaro, 
nila thaano, vidai illa vinaa thaano

Vaaninn,
pulam thaandi, nilam theendum, mazhai thaano
Naalum,
aval illai, enil inge pizhaithaano

Unn maar meedhum, 
thol meedhum naan thunginen
uyir ingeye pogattum enrenginen
karaigale illaa nathi, orey oru nathi

Orr aagaaya dhooram, 
naan poginra podhum, en pakkathil nirpaal aval
Naan vilkindra neram,
pon kai rendum neelum, than kakkathil vaipaal aval

Naan kaalai pani, 
nee pullin nuni, naan velaamal nee thaanginaai

Naan kelaa oli, 
neethane mozhi, en osaikku porulaagiraai...oooo ho...

Yaar, 
aval yaaro, aval yaaro, kanaa thaano
Yaaro, 
nila thaano, vidai illa vinaa thaano

Naan thoongaadha podhum, 
en thunbathin podhum, en annai pol kaathaai ennai 
Pon vaan engum neeye, 
vin meen aaginraaye, naan annaanthu paarpen unnai
Naan ketkum varam, 
en vaazh naal thavam, un nanban indri verethadi

oh paara mugam
ne kaatum kanam, naan kuraamal saavenadi hooo hoo..

Yaar, 
aval yaaro, aval yaaro, kanaa thaano
Yaaro, 
nila thaano, vidai illa vinaa thaano

Vaaninn,
pulam thaandi, nilam theendum, mazhai thaano
Naalum,
aval illai, enil inge pizhaithaano

Unn maar meedhum, 
thol meedhum naan thunginen
uyir ingeye pogattum enrenginen
karaigale illaa nathi, orey oru nathi
